thread.title: Now hiring: Newsome Trucking, Dover Electric, more
thread.title_full: Now hiring: Newsome Trucking, Dover Electric, more | www.ajc.com

author: Lauren Colley
title: Now hiring: Newsome Trucking, Dover Electric, more
text:
1. Structural engineer : Engineering Design Technologies, Inc. of Marietta seeks a structural engineer. Duties include planning, designing, drafting and directing civil engineering projects. [ Apply today ]
2. Automotive mechanic : Goodyear of Buckhead is looking for a skilled technician with a talent for diagnosing vehicle issues, for instance, drivability, suspension, air conditioning, brakes, cooling systems and all aspects of automotive maintenance and repair. [ Apply today ]
3. Electrician apprentice, team leaders, supervisors and subcontractors : Dover Electric of Woodstock is looking for an experienced electrical personnel with one year minimum experience. [ Apply today ]
4. OTR and dump truck drivers : Newsome Trucking, Inc. of Canton is looking for truck drivers with two years of experience. [ Apply today ]
5. Sales associates, team members and team leaders : Rooms 1-2-3 is seeking team members for their new store in Sandy Springs. [ Apply today ]
6. Origination and disbursement specialist, student aid services : Georgia Student Finance Commission of Tucker is seeking a specialist to support the application processing and origination of state and lottery funded scholarships, grants and loans. [ Apply today ]
7. Gutter and subcontractors : Atlanta construction company needs experienced workers. [ Apply today ]
8. Systems analysts : INTIGROW of Duluth seeks two systems analysts to prepare tech reports and studies for system upgrades and customized programs. [ Apply today ]
9. Compliance specialist : Old Republic Aerospace of Kennesaw is looking for a compliance specialist with one to three years of experience in a property and casualty insurance compliance environment with filing experience. [ Apply today ]
